title: The Raw Place - WTC
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: This outlet is at World Trade Center Mall. Offers grab n go cold-pressed juices, smoothies, cold-brew coffee plus chia bowls, raw food and desserts. Add superfoods to add to your smoothie or juice or buy in pre-packed bags.
streetAddress: WTC-Souk (Central Market), Khalifa St, Al Markaziyah
